artist: Artist: Toyohara Chikanobu; Publisher: Fukuda Hatsujirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: triptych assembled, folded, mounted in album: male figure near center in gray and black brocade robes standing before elderly figure seated on elevated structure; elderly figure is holding a bow on his lap and wears an ornate robe and headdress; other figures in red standing behind center figure; portion of bright orange and red pagoda at L
markings: Seal (red) LLC: Yo_ | Seals (black) LLC: Printed and published by Fukuda Hatsujiro_ in May of Meiji 30 | (square seal with telephone number) | (illegible small seal LLC)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: Signed LLC: Yo_shu_ Kunichika  | Title URQ
title: Visiting Nikko_ Shrine
